name: Sachin Kumar
college: Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology Allahabad

social_work: Department Coordinator at Student Mentorship Program (SMP MNNIT)

education.school: Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology Allahabad

projects.name: EduFlex
projects.description: Developed a secure platform facilitating financial education with features like users can discover, purchase, and enroll in a wide range of courses on various subjects and skill levels. Instructors can easily create, publish, and manage their courses, while learners can access course materials and track their progress seamlessly.

projects.name: Hostel Management system
projects.description: Created a comprehensive web application for hostel management, featuring secure user authentication, a robust complaint management system with voting and commenting, user moderation, and detailed financial management and analysis tools.

projects.name: Godel Numbering-Based Encryption/Decryption Algorithm
projects.description: Fast Encryption/Decryption: Can handle strings up to 1 million characters in less than a second. Prime Number Based Encoding: Utilizes prime numbers and Godel Numbering for unique character encoding. Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange: Secure key exchange using Diffie-Hellman for generating encryption keys. Buffer String for Security: Adds buffer strings to encrypted text for additional security and randomness.

experiences.description: Developed a React Flow-based financial data visualizer for 100+ tables, improving data access and query optimization. Built and managed data pipelines and automated task scheduling for 10+ workflows with Apache Airflow and Supabase, enhancing efficiency and generating automated MIS and scheduled reports. Integrated Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for 100+ users, developed downloadable financial reports, and enhanced frontend user experience, achieving scalability and user engagement. Implemented content management with Strapi CMS, resulting in 50+ articles to enhance content strategy and audience engagement.

full_output.name: Sachin Kumar

3rd Position in Code of the day event, Avishkar 2023 (A week long event related to DSA Problem Solution)
